DESCRIPTION: Titanium Nitride: Gold color, General Purpose coating. Provides excellent wear resistance with good lubricity.
APPLICATION: Recommended for ferrous and non-metallic materials.

DESCRIPTION: Titanium Carbonitride: Blue-Grey color, abrasion resistant coating.
APPLICATION: Recommended for Silicon Aluminum, brass and bronze applications, cast iron and alloy steels.

DESCRIPTION: Aluminum Titanium Nitride: Blue-Black color, multi-layered high heat-resistant coating.
APPLICATION: Recommended for semi and dry milling applications in high temperature alloys and hardened steel materials.
